name: Do Not Track API
description: API to allow the browser's Do Not Track setting to be queried via `navigator.doNotTrack`. Due to lack of adoption the Do Not Track specification was deprecated in 2018.

notes.general: Partial support refers to the doNotTrack field being misnamed, or being attached to an object other than `navigator` (e.g. `window`).

byNum.2: IE 11 and Edge 16- use `window.doNotTrack` instead of `navigator.doNotTrack`.
byNum.3: Browsers based on Gecko versions prior to 32 used 'yes' and 'no' rather than '1' and '0'.
byNum.4: Between versions 6.1.1 and 9.1.3, Safari supported an ultimately-rejected amendment to the spec, using `window.doNotTrack` rather than `navigator.doNotTrack`.
